heist.shared

Class ConcentrationSite

  • java.lang.Object
    • heist.shared.ConcentrationSite

  • public class ConcentrationSite
extends java.lang.Object
    The concentration site is where OrdinaryThieves wait for the MasterThief to assign them a AssaultParty. ConcentrationSite is accessed by the MasterThief to get OrdinaryThieves to create and join AssaultParties.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ConcentrationSite(Configuration configuration)
      ConcentrationSite constructor.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Create new Party of OrdinaryThieves with the thieves waiting in this ConcentrationSite.
      AssaultParty[] getParties()
      Get parties queue, contains the last parties created during this simulation.
      void prepareExcursion(OrdinaryThief thief)
      OrdinaryThief enters the ConcentrationSite and joins the assault party.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ConcentrationSite

        public ConcentrationSite(Configuration configuration)
        ConcentrationSite constructor.
        Parameters:
        configuration - Configuration to be used.

    • Method Detail

      • getParties

        public AssaultParty[] getParties()
        Get parties queue, contains the last parties created during this simulation. These parties are used for logging.
        Returns:
        Parties created during the simulation.

      • createNewParty

        public AssaultParty createNewParty(int partySize,
                                   int maxDistance,
                                   RoomStatus room)
                            throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Create new Party of OrdinaryThieves with the thieves waiting in this ConcentrationSite. The MasterThief creates the party and adds it to the party list and gets locked until all thieves join the party. The last thief to join the party wakes up the MasterThief.
        Parameters:
        partySize - AssaultParty size.
        room - Target room.
        maxDistance - Maximum distance allowed between thieves when crawling.
        Returns:
        AssaultParty created.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - Exception

      • prepareExcursion

        public void prepareExcursion(OrdinaryThief thief)
                      throws java.lang.InterruptedException,
                             java.lang.Exception
        OrdinaryThief enters the ConcentrationSite and joins the assault party. The last OrdinaryThief to join the assault party wakes up the MasterThief that is waiting in createNewParty.
        Parameters:
        thief - OrdinaryThief to add.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - Exception
        java.lang.Exception
